import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Navbar, Nav, NavDropdown, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; // import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Image } from 'react-bootstrap'; import jbchusalogo from '../images/jbchusa-logo.png'; class NavBar extends React.Component { render() { return (
{/* Jesus Baptist Hawaii Church */}
{/* Center the image */}
{/* Align NavLinks to the right */} Home Staff And Leadership What We Believe What Is Christianity? Contact Us New To Church? Church Life setShowDropdown(true)} // Open dropdown on hover onMouseLeave={() => setShowDropdown(false)} // Close dropdown when mouse leaves > Church School Youth Group Young Adult Group Mother's Group Father's Group USA Conference Life World Mission
) } } export default NavBar;
